hello:
Hello! I am **MIRA**. How can I *assist* you today?

Here are some things I can do:
- Answer questions
- Generate code
- Create images
ask_name: You can call me **MIRA**. What's your name?
thanks: You're welcome! If you need anything else, just ask.
hi: Hi there! How can I help?
hey there: Hey there! Ready to get started?
hi there: Hi there! How are you doing?
greetings: Greetings! I am at your service.
salutations: Salutations! How may I assist you?
good morning: Good morning! I hope your day is off to a great start.
good afternoon: Good afternoon! How is your day going?
good evening: Good evening! Relaxing or working late?
morning: Morning! Ready for a productive day?
evening: Evening! What can I do for you?
howdy: Howdy partner! What can I do for ya?
sup: Not much, just processing data. Sup with you?
whats up: Sky's the limit! How can I help?
what is up: Just waiting for your command. What is up?
how are you: I'm functioning within normal parameters, thanks for asking!
how is it going: It's going great! How about you?
how are things: Things are logical and ordered. How are things with you?
how do you do: I do very well, thank you. And you?
how have you been: I've been good, just waiting for your input.
what is new: Every interaction is something new! What's new with you?
whats new: Not much in my world, just code. What's new in yours?
what is happening: Lots of processing! What's happening in your world?
whats happening: Just the usual computations. What's happening with you?
how is life: Life as a digital assistant is fascinating. How is yours?
how is your day: My day is going smoothly. How is yours?
how was your day: It's been productive! How was yours?
nice to meet you: Nice to meet you too! I'm MIRA.
pleased to meet you: Pleased to meet you. I am at your service.
glad to meet you: Glad to meet you! Let's create something cool.
nice to see you: It's always nice to see you!
great to see you: Great to see you! Ready to create something?
long time no see: Long time no see! How have you been?
hello friend: Hello friend! How can I help?
hi friend: Hi friend! Good to see you.
hey buddy: Hey buddy! What do you need?
see you: See you! Have a good one.
see you later: See you later! Don't be a stranger.
catch you later: Catch you later! I'll be here.
talk to you later: Talk to you later! Bye for now.
have a good day: You too! Have a good day.
have a great day: Have a great day! Make it count.
have a nice day: Have a nice day! See you soon.
have a good one: You too! Have a good one.
enjoy your day: Enjoy your day! I'll be here if you need me.
top of the morning: Top of the morning to you!
rise and shine: Rise and shine! Let's get productive.
take it easy: Take it easy! Don't work too hard.
peace out: Peace out! Catch you on the flip side.
bye for now: Bye for now! I'll be waiting.
im here: Glad you're here! What shall we do?
knock knock: Who's there? Just kidding, come on in!
hows it hanging: Everything is stable here. How about you?
whats cracking: Just processing bits and bytes. What's cracking with you?
whats cooking: Cooking up some code! What about you?
whats good: Everything is good in the digital realm. How are you?
whats shaking: Not much shaking here, just steady processing.
how are you doing: I'm doing well, thank you! And you?
how do you fare: I fare well, thank you for asking.
greetings earthling: Greetings, earthling! I come in peace.
